action: Added apps/web (Vite React TS) and apps/desktop (Tauri v2) configured to load apps/web (devUrl 5173, dist ../../web/dist); added protocol crate voxelle-protocol.
claim: Scaffolded web+desktop workspace
evidence: cargo test -p voxelle-protocol; npm run build -w @voxelle/web; cargo build in apps/desktop/src-tauri

action: Replaced Vite starter UI with Voxelle shell: Spaces list, Space rooms list, Room chat feed + composer (mock store). Added react-router routes and app styling.
claim: Implemented Voxelle web UI shell

action: Implemented minimal RFC v0 signing pipeline in TS: Ed25519 keypairs, SPKI DER encoding, principal/device IDs (sha256+base64url), delegation certs (netstring + JCS), and EventV1 MSG_POST signing. Room composer now appends signed events to localStorage and renders feed from events.
claim: Wired chat composer to signed RFC events

action: Switched to @noble/ed25519 async APIs (getPublicKeyAsync/signAsync/verifyAsync) so WebCrypto SHA-512 is used and the runtime no longer requires hashes.sha512 to be configured.
claim: Fix noble-ed25519 sha512 configuration error
Add RFC event validation pipeline

action: Added transport-MVP tasks (webrtc transport, signaling, invite links, sync UX). Next: implement validation + DAG heads, then WebRTC + signaling, then sync protocol over transport.
